xml_utility module¶

class xml_utility.XMLUtility¶

Bases : object

This class is used in order to generate a XML representation of a Domino game in order to save and restore games.

static generate_XML_tree_from_game(game)¶

Generate a pre-formated XML tree from a Game.

Paramètres

Game (a Domino game.) –

Renvoie

tree

Type renvoyé

a XML tree (xml.etree.ElementTree)

static get_xml_data(file_name)¶

Used to build the Game elements from a XML tree.

Paramètres

file_name (a str (the name of the XML save file)) –

Renvoie

player is a list of Player objects, with their Hand board is a Board undo_stack is a stack

Type renvoyé

A tuple (player, board, undo_stack)

static load_game_from_xml(update, current_game, file_name)¶
static save_game_to_xml(current_game, file_name)¶

Saves the current game to an XML file.

Paramètres

  • current_game (the current Game) –

  • file_name (the file name (without extension)) –

static write_XML_tree_to_file(tree, file_name)¶

Write an XML tree in a text file.

Paramètres

  • tree (a XML tree) –

  • file_name (a str) –

Renvoie
